choices.E: Min-Max planning replenishing a purchase request
choices.A: Manual orders using File Based Data Load
choices.B: Min-Max planning replenishing a transfer order

questions.question_text: Which process requires the Release Planning recommendation process to be executed manually so that a supply order gets created?

discussion.content:
E. Min-Max planning replenishing a purchase request

Supply order requests for purchase requisitions, transfer orders, and work orders go into the Supply Chain Orchestration Interface table. You must run the Process Supply Chain Orchestration Interface process in Oracle Fusion Supply Chain Orchestration to create the actual supply orders in the destination systems.

Not sure of answer low confidence. All answers seems to be for automatic orders so answer A. seems logical only. This is the closest link found:

https://docs.oracle.com/en/cloud/saas/supply-chain-and-manufacturing/19d/faspf/manage-supply-plans.html#FASPF2256229

questions.question_text:
In a Cloud Order Management implementation, a customer has order capture and fulfillment systems located across the globe. The customer would like to ensure that the time zone is reflected in each transaction based on the location of the entity.
What step is required in order to achieve this business requirement?

discussion.content:
Not clear. D. may be the answer.

Link provided shows EBS document. Found this link instead whihc refers to Inv Org. Source System?

https://docs.oracle.com/en/cloud/saas/supply-chain-management/20a/faiom/implement.html#FAIOM3117604

choices.B: Select the time zone in user preferences when entering a transaction.
choices.D: Select the time zone during the configuration of the Source system.
choices.C: Select the time zone by using the profile option in the Functional Setup Manager,
choices.A: Select the time zone when importing a transaction to the Order Management System.

questions.question_text:
Your company has a single global installation that contains Oracle Cloud Product Management, Oracle Cloud Trading Community Model, and Cloud Order
Management. It has all the execution systems implemented in tandem with Global Order Promising. The Master data elements have also been migrated to their respective areas. The next step is to run the date collection program to load the planning data repository.
Which five data elements will the collection program load into the planning data repository? (Choose five.)

discussion.content:
CDEFG is the correct answer.
reference : https://docs.oracle.com/cd/E25054_01/fusionapps.1111/e20386/F499608AN2AEC9.htm

For the following entities you can only use the Web service upload method to collect data from external source systems:

Currencies
Order orchestration reference objects
Shipping methods
Per Page 23 of "Implementing Order Management 20D", the answers are ACDEG
Not sure. solution MAY be right but link contradicts and sparks more questions.

Solution seems correct: D.

https://docs.oracle.com/en/cloud/saas/supply-chain-management/20a/faims/shipping.html#FAIMS2581964_3

Before implementing your external systems integration, consider the following points.
If you plan to receive material using a 3PL provider or WMS, then use the predefined scheduled processes to generate a receipt advice.
If you plan to ship material using a 3PL provider or WMS, then use the predefined scheduled processes to generate shipment requests.

questions.question_text:
Your company is implementing Order Management Cloud to manage the sales orders but fulfilment happens through third party logistics (3PL).
What process should be executed to communicate to the 3PL system that the sales orders are ready to pick release and ship?

discussion.content: D . Assign header.mRuleDecision.compensationPattern = "CANCEL_CREATE" in the business rules for Compensation

Solution answer: 
C. Define two rules: one of type CANCEL and another of type CREATE.

90% confident

choices.C: Define two rules: one of type CANCEL and another of type CREATE.
choices.B: Define one rule of type UPDATE.
choices.D: Define one rule of type CANCEL_CREATE.
choices.A: Define one rule of type CREATE.

questions.question_text:
Your company wants to revise an existing sales order in Order Management Cloud to compensate the downstream legacy fulfillment system that does not allow any update to the already interfaced fulfillment lines.
What type of compensation pattern rule would you need to define for the orchestration process fulfillment step?
